about_the_game:
Venture deeper into the mystery of Infinite Inside with The Lost Depths, the first new DLC chapter that delves into the influence of the Plinth on ancient mythology. A new Plinth manifests in your room, sending you on a journey to rebuild a crucial artefact and deliver it to the lost civilisation of Atlantis.

Key Features:

• A Unique Adventure: Discover a newly designed level inspired by Atlantis, featuring ethereal underwater environments, expanded game mechanics, and fresh puzzles.

• Introducing the Challenge Room: Prove your skill to the Plinth in a timed challenge, solving a vital puzzle before the room closes in. Complete this trial to gain the Plinth’s trust in delivering the artefact.

• Replayable Challenges: Once unlocked, revisit the Challenge Room with other keys from the game, offering new ways to test yourself and master the puzzles. Compete for the fastest solve time and top the global leaderboard.

reviews:
“Amazingly solid world. Beautiful soundtrack. Intriguing puzzles.”
9/10 – TheSixthAxis

“Not all VR games leave you feeling this impressed, but I fell in love with its fundamental yet detailed mazes, and I would recommend this to anyone searching for an engaging puzzler.”

4/5 – UploadVR
